note:
Me:
Reading SF&F since about age 9, friends with LGBTQ people since age 16, working in software/tech since I was 16, practicing Zen since 17 or 18, on Internet by late 1980s. I helped invent modern credit card terminals at Verifone in 1980s, founded small ISP LavaNet in 1994, back to sw dev from 2005 on.

Usenet (talk.bizarre), Making Light, Twitter.
"I'm normal by Cubetown standards."

Mostly here to chat, banter, & boost my friends & favorite writers.

Cis/bi, he/him, relaxed about it.
